text: @NYGovCuomo That's not what's happening&they don't turn people away bc they want the money. My friend was discharged from North Shore Manhasset to finish quarantine at the Manor at Whitestone, he was put in a Room with a 22yr old WITHOUT Covid19,he was NOT isolated as he should have been
